entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [9.0-preview.1] Output from dotnet test when test process crashes is not shown to user with MSBUILDTERMINALLOGGER #39156
  • [Hot Reload] Enable Blazor hot reloading for multiple browser windows at the same time #39153
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.SDK Dependency on System.Text.Json - File not found through Azure Devops build #39152

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Discussion: Prototype for `dotnet tool update --all` #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Bump Application-Insights to 2.22 #38638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
